info.title: Integral module for managing all user-related operations
info.description: This module is an integral part of an application, responsible for managing all user-related operations.

tags.name: features
tags.description: Handles all operations related to features

tags.name: feature-groups
tags.description: Handles all operations related to feature groups

tags.name: users
tags.description: Handles all operations related to user management

tags.name: sessions
tags.description: Handles all operations related to user sessions

get.summary: This endpoint retrieves features in the form of a list.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items per page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to sort by. The available fields are: 'key', 'name', 'createdAt', 'updatedAt'.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order of sorting. The available orders are: 'DESC', 'ASC'.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the feature to filter by.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the feature to filter by.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: No features were found to compose a list. This may occur if there are no features in the database or the provided search criteria did not match any features.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: This endpoint retrieves feature by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Feature to retrieve.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: The feature was not found. Please check the provided feature ID.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: This endpoint retrieves features by key or name in the form of a list.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the feature to filter by.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the feature to filter by.

200.description: List of Features By Key Or Name.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: No feature were found to compose a list. This may occur if there are no features in the database or the provided search criteria did not match any features.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: This endpoint retrieves features of the user by your ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve your features.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: This endpoint retrieves features of the feature group by your ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the feature group to retrieve your features.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: This endpoint retrieves feature groups in the form of a list.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items per page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to sort by. The available fields are: 'key', 'name', 'createdAt', 'updatedAt'.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order of sorting. The available orders are: 'DESC', 'ASC'.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the feature group to filter by.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the feature group to filter by.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: No feature groups were found to compose a list. This may occur if there are no feature groups in the database or the provided search criteria did not match any feature groups.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

post.summary: This endpoint create a feature group.

requestBody.description: The required data for a new feature group to be created.

201.description: Feature Group was be created successfully.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: The provided feature id(s) was not found.

409.description: The request could not be completed because the key or name provided is already associated with an existing feature group.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: This endpoint retrieves feature groups by key or name in the form of a list.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the feature group to filter by.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the feature group to filter by.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: No feature groups were found to compose a list. This may occur if there are no feature groups in the database or the provided search criteria did not match any feature groups.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: This endpoint retrieves a feature group by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Feature Group to retrieve.

200.description: The feature group was successfully retrieved.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: The feature group was not found. Please check the provided feature group ID.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

put.summary: This endpoint update a feature group by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Feature Group to update.

requestBody.description: The required data for a feature group to be updated.

200.description: The feature group was successfully updated.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: The requested resource was not found. This could be due to an incorrect feature group ID, or feature Id(s).

409.description: The request could not be completed because the key or name provided is already associated with an existing feature group.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

delete.summary: This endpoint delete a feature group by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Feature Group to delete.

204.description: The Feature Group was successfully deleted.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: The Feature Group was not found. Please check the provided Feature Group ID.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: This endpoint retrieves users in the form of a list.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items per page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to sort by. The available fields are: 'email', 'name', 'createdAt', 'updatedAt'.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order of sorting. The available orders are: 'DESC', 'ASC'.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email to filter by.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name to filter by.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: No users were found to compose a list. This may occur if there are no users in the database or the provided search criteria did not match any users.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

requestBody.description: The required data for a new user to be created.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: The provided feature group ID was not found.

409.description: The request could not be completed because the email provided is already associated with an existing account.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

get.summary: This endpoint retrieves a user by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: The user was not found. Please check the provided user ID.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

put.summary: This endpoint update a user by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to update.

requestBody.description: The required data for a user to be updated.

400.description: The user has repeated features. Each feature should be unique.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: The requested resource was not found. This could be due to an incorrect user ID, feature group, or feature.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

delete.summary: This endpoint delete a user by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to delete.

401.description: The requested token was not found.

403.description: The requested user do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource.

404.description: The user was not found. Please check the provided user ID.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

post.summary: This endpoint allows a new user to sign up for an account.

requestBody.description: The required data for a new user to sign up.

204.description: The account has been successfully created for the new user.

409.description: The request could not be completed because the email provided is already associated with an existing account.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

post.summary: This endpoint is used for user authentication. It allows a user to sign in to their account using their credentials.

requestBody.description: The user needs to provide the necessary credentials (usually email and password) to sign in.

204.description: The request was successful and a token has been provided for the user's session.

401.description: The user's credentials are not recognized or are incorrect.

403.description: The user is not associated with any feature group.

404.description: The user is not associated with any feature.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while processing the request.

cookieAuth.name: token
cookieAuth.description: The cookie value requested in routes in swagger is not necessary if you have logged in and received your token.

total.example: You are already on the last page!
total.description: Information about the total number of pages.

value.message: There are repeated features. Each feature should be unique.
You do not have sufficient privileges to access this resource. Please contact the administrator if you believe this is an error.
The provided credentials are invalid. Please check your email and password.
The user does not have an assigned feature group. Please contact the administrator to resolve this issue.
The feature group(s) was not found.
The feature group key is already registered. Please use a unique key.
The feature group name is already registered. Please use a unique name.
The provided email is already in use. Please use a different email.
The authentication token is invalid or has expired. Please log in again.
The authentication token was not found. Please log in again.
